page.title: 10Employment, Rangeworthy
page.content: {These are the results of a survey}of the jobs of people who live in the area. It is based on a representative sample and is not exhaustive. {First we found out who people worked {for}and made some interesting discoveries. About one third are self employed Many people run businesses from their homes. Over one third work for private firms and only a few work for the government or local authority. In our sample, there was only one unemployed person. {Then we looked at the kinds of jobs {people have}and found that the biggest group is in agriculture and market gardening. The numbers in manufacturing and engineering are equalled by the numbers in services and transport. There are also people working in building, education, offices and computers.
